-----

## Table of Contents

- [Installation](#installation)
- [Usage](#usage)
- [License](#license)

## Installation

```console
pip install pomcli
```

## Usage

Run the Pomodoro timer from the command line:

```console
pomcli --work 25 --break_time 5
```

- `--work`: Work duration in minutes (default: 25)
- `--break_time`: Break duration in minutes (default: 5)
